name: emails-queue-api
author: David Bowland
description: Queues emails in SQS to be sent by emails-queue-service

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp package*.json dist/ && cd dist/ && HUSKY=0 NODE_ENV=production npm ci
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist coverage && NODE_ENV=test npm ci
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run quick-start
scripts.quick-start: tsc && HUSKY=0 sam build && EMAIL_BUCKET=emails-dbowland SQS_QUEUE_URL=https://sqs.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/494887012091/emails-queue-service-SimpleQueue-146A3KUXV7CRG sam local invoke --event events/post-item.json
